abstract.p: List of upcoming events of interest in financial world

block.p: MONDAY
Veterans Day: stock markets open, bond markets and many banks closed.
TUESDAY
Earnings reports are expected from Dell Computer and TJX.
WEDNESDAY
The Labor Department releases the Producer Price Index for October.
The Federal Open Market Committee meets to set interest-rate policy.
THURSDAY
The Commerce Department reports on retail sales for October. In September they rose 0.7 percent.
The Labor Department releases the Consumer Price Index for October. In September it rose 0.3 percent.
FRIDAY
The Federal Reserve reports on industrial production and capacity utilization for October. In September, production rose 0.2 percent and capacity utilization stood at 83.3 percent.
The University of Michigan releases its index of consumer sentiment.
